positions.title: Software Engineer Intern
positions.summary: Collect usability metrics and component information for tablet devices, and use this information to generate component suggestions for future tablet designs. Work with multiple teams on several testing and implementation projects. Design and develop solutions to unique and specific problems.

positions.title: Software Engineer
positions.summary: Handle the design, development, integration, and deployment of software systems and associated systems including database architecture, application design, and interface design. Analyze and optimize currently implemented software systems to improve scalability and reliability. Promote best practices in software design to improve quality and enable software autonomy, diminishing third party reliance within the company.
